Class ec.e.file.EEditableFile 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.file.EDirectoryEntry
           |
           +----ec.e.file.EEditableFile
public class EEditableFile
extends EDirectoryEntry
implements EFileInfo
A sturdy representation of a file which may be opened for editing (reading or writing, sequential or random-access).

asAppendableFile()
Produce a representation of this file which can only be opened for appending.
asReadableFile()
Produce a representation of this file which can only be opened for reading.
editor()
Produce an instance of EFileEditor that will read and write this file.
inputStream()
Produce an InputStream that will read this file.
isDirectory()
Test if this entry describes a directory (it doesn't).
lastModified()
Determines the time that the file represented by this File object was last modified.
length()
Length in bytes of this file.
outputStream()
Produce an OutputStream that will write this file.

asAppendableFile 
  public EAppendableFile asAppendableFile()
Produce a representation of this file which can only be opened for appending.
asReadableFile 
  public EReadableFile asReadableFile()
Produce a representation of this file which can only be opened for reading.
editor 
  public EFileEditor editor() throws IOException
Produce an instance of EFileEditor that will read and write this file.
inputStream 
  public InputStream inputStream() throws IOException
Produce an InputStream that will read this file.
isDirectory 
  public boolean isDirectory()
Test if this entry describes a directory (it doesn't).
Returns:
false, since this is a file
Overrides:
isDirectory in class EDirectoryEntry
length 
  public long length()
Length in bytes of this file.
lastModified 
  public long lastModified()
Determines the time that the file represented by this File object was last modified. As per the Java class library spec, the return value is system-dependent and should only be used to compare with other values returned by lastModified(). It should not be interpreted as an absolute time.
Returns:
the "time" the file specified by this object was last modified
outputStream 
  public OutputStream outputStream() throws IOException
Produce an OutputStream that will write this file.
